name: Maggot Meal
description:
To atone for your sins, you have been condemned to eternally drive away maggots and to use their blood to make offerings to the Old Ones. In exchange for your offerings, you will become stronger and faster. But beware, for you are not the only one...

Maggot Meal is a spooky arcade ball bouncer in which you must drive away the ever increasing hordes of maggots and collect their blood.

Join our Discord Community: https://discord.gg/MCV3pcKGZh
